page.title: 19EDUCATION
page.content: Our school is ST. PATRICK'S PRIMARY,in the sea/side town of TROON.There are 200 pupils in the school,8 teachers,1 headmaster and many back/up staff. The P.7 of 1985 consists of 28 pupils working on THE DOMESDAY PROJECT which we hope will give people in the future some idea what life was like when this information was written.Most of the class are aged between 11/12 years. Our teacher is Mrs.McALLISTER who is married with a son aged 14. She also has a dog, a SHETLAND COLLIE, named LAD.The class join together for lessons and social events. This year we have enjoyed, swimming classes, a disco at Christmas, an outing back in history to an EDWARDIAN School and a fantastic 5 day visit to an outdoor pursuit centre at Glaisnock.More about our class in the final text.
